ygData.subject: Re: One more thing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Staff of Writhing is not deep in Sol B Its pretty near the zone (from lavastorm, not from sol a) so just get a monk to pull it then fight near zone. At his
ygData.messageBody:
Staff of Writhing is not deep in Sol B

Its pretty near the zone (from lavastorm, not from sol a) so just get a monk
to pull it then fight near zone.

At his spawn spot will either be a Solusek kobold or the kobold noble (which
holds the staff of writhing)

And when pulled, 2 more greater kobolds will come.

Kobold Noble carries Staff of Writhing (common) and petrified erudite heart
pendant (rare).

and if you have a party of 35... not very wise to camp shimmering orb. the
froglok scryer prolly has only about 400hp or so and is about level 22...

----- Original Message -----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 9:29 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] One more thing.


> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> from what i know Staff of Withering is in Sol B... deep in Sol... u need a
> party of 35s to camp for it.... if u have a party of 35... may as well
camp
> for the Shimmering Orb....
>
> thast all i know,
> Nic
